EmailTemplate.name: Med Professional: Request for more information
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Requested: Make-A-Wish Request for More Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Dr. {!Lead.DV_Signer_First_Name__c} {!Lead.DV_Signer_Last_Name__c},
Thank you for completing our electronic Diagnosis Verification form for {!Lead.FirstName}’s Make-A-Wish referral!
Make-A-Wish grants wishes to children with critical illnesses (i.e. a progressive, degenerative or malignant conditions) that are currently placing the child’s life in jeopardy. We are reviewing your patient’s medical eligibility and have the following additional questions:
[ENTER QUESTIONS HERE]
For more information about our eligibility criteria, please visit our medical professional referral page at https://wish.org/medical-referral. We appreciate your help. Thank you for partnering with us in granting life-changing wishes for your patients with critical illnesses!
Regards, {!Lead.OwnerFullName}
Wish Referral: {!Lead.Id}
